job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWe have an exciting opportunity available for a Machine Learning Engineer within our PwC Waterfall or Cape Town office You will design and build new Data ScienceMachine Learning ML software solutions while participating in all phases of the software development lifecycle Your ultimate goal is to create highquality software solutions that meet clients needsppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliBSc BEng or BIT degree preferably with Postgraduate degrees strong foundational Computer Science knowledge requiredliliExperience in the design development and deployment of Machine Learning solutionsliliMinimum 4 years total working experience with 2 years of experience in developing Machine Learning solutionsliliExtensive Python development experience with experience in creating ML pipelinesliliExtensive knowledge of Dockercontainerisation experience with deployment on Kubernetes will be highly advantageousliliDatabase design patterns amp object relational mapping in PythonliliExperience with Git amp collaborative software developmentliliTest driven developmentliliExperience in MLOps will be highly advantageousliulpbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliAssist in designing and implementing functional application requirements for clientfacing and internal ML solutionsliliOwnership of the delivery of functional aspects of an application design in line with functional specification as part of a larger multidisciplinary teamliliGuidance and upskilling of junior ML team members on various aspects of the machine learning development lifecycleliliGuidance to wider team members on various aspects of the ML application development lifecycleliliCollaborate with Data Engineers to ensure data and data structures cater for solution needsliliCollaborate with UXUI designers to specify UI requirements for application designsliliCollaborate with FrontEnd developers to ensure accurate delivery of UI application specificationsliliBuild of efficient backend application featuresliliManage application testing and bug fixesliliPrepare technical documentationliliImplement software enhancements and suggest improvementsliliReview code from other developers and team membersliulpbrppemPlease apply via LinkedInemp
